hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: The nearest a servant comes to his Lord is when he is prostrating himself, so make supplication (in this state)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقَالُ فِي الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: What Is To Be Said While Bowing And Prostrating
